wikipedia_page.main: Stan Leonard (1924–1995) was a Welsh footballer, who played as a winger in the Football League for Chester.

response: Stan Leonard (February 2, 1915 – December 15, 2005) was a Canadian professional golfer who played on the PGA Tour in the 1950s and 1960s. Leonard won three PGA Tour events, eight Canadian PGA Championships, and 16 other events on the Canadian Tour. He is a member of the Canadian Golf Hall of Fame.
